verses.text: Ha vinhaj David ix b'itan jun b'it tik t'a Jehová ayic ix colchajel vinh t'a yol sk'ab' vinhaj rey Saúl yet' t'a yol sk'ab' eb' ajk'ol t'a vinh.
Mamin Jehová, ichato nhaq'ueen aj t'ayin, ichato in cuartel aji, yujto in Columal ach.

Ach in Diosal, a t'ayach scot vip, a t'ayach tzin col in b'a, in Tanhvumal aji. In Columal ach, te ay a poder. Uuj max in yamchajlaj yuj eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin. Ha ach ix in a col t'a mach snib'ej in sataneli.
Smojton val a b'itaji. Ayic svalan in b'a t'ayach, t'a val elanhchamel tzin a colancanel t'a yol sk'ab' eb' ajk'ol yajoch t'ayin.
Ha smay chamel ix oymaj t'a in patic. Manh jantacoc yaelal ix javi t'a vib'anh yic tzin sateli.
Ha chamel, ichato toxo ix spixoch slasu t'ayin, ichato ix sb'o in yaalil yic tzin telvi.
Mamin Jehová, ix val in b'a t'ayach ayic ayinek' t'a skal in somk'olal. Ach in Diosal, ix in k'an a colval. Ha t'a a cajnub' ix ab' tas ix vala'. Ix k'och vav t'a a chiquin.
Ichato ix ek' jun niwan quixcab' te ov. Ix te ib'xi sb'achnub'al satcha’anh. Ix tzicub'tanhaj val yuj yoval a k'ool ach in Diosal.
Ichato ix elta tab' t'a yol a nhi', haxo t'a yol a ti' ichato ix elta jun k'ak' te ov. Ichato ix elta tzipipoc tzak'ak' t'a yol a ti' chi'.
Ix a jac satcha’anh, ix ach emuli. Ayoch nivac k'ik'al asun t'a yalanh oc ayic ach emul chi'.
Ay ach q'ue t'a yib'anh jun querubín, ix ach b'at jenhenhoc, ix ach b'at b'achachoc t'a yib'anh ik'.
k'ub'an ach el b'aj te k'ik'q'uinal. Ix a k'ub'ejel a b'ha t'a skal k'ik'al asun b'ud'jinaquel yuj ha ha'.
Ach in Diosal, yuj scopopial a tziquiquial ix scha sk'ak'al juntzanh tzak'ak' chi'.
Mamin Jehová, ek' achto t'a yib'anh smasanil, ix el av icha val sk'anh k'u t'a satcha’anh. Ix cot sacb'at yet' tzak'ak'.
Ix ak'anb'at a jul-lab', haxo eb' ajk'ool ix saclemcanb'at eb' yuj. Ix a julanb'at jun k'ak' tzek' copnaj t'a skal eb', ix pechchaj eb' yuj.
Mamin Jehová, yuj schaanhil ix ach avaji yuj pax jun ik' te ov ix aq'uelta, ix checlaj yich ha' mar. Yuj pax chi' ix checlaj yich yol yib'anhk’inal tik.
Ach in Diosal, masanto t'a satcha’anh ix ak'cot a colval t'ayin, ichato ix in ik'q'ueta t'a yol jun ha ha' te jul yich.
Ix in a colan t'a eb' ajk'ool te ay yip, malaj tzin och t'a eb', yelxo val te tek'an eb' t'a vichanh.
Ix och b'ulnaj eb' t'ayin ayic ay in och t'a ilk'olal, a achxo Jehová ix ach och ved'oc.
Ix in ik'anelta b'aj lot'an, ix in ak'ancanoch b'aj levan. Ix in a colo' yujto xajan in uuj.
Mamin Jehová, ix ak' spac t'ayin yujto tojol ix vutej in b'a. Ix ak' a wach'k'olal t'ayin, yujto malaj in mul,
yujto tzin k'anab'ajej a b'eyb'al. Ach in Diosal, max in k'ulejlaj chukal, malaj in gana svik'canel in b'a t'ayach.
Naannhej masanil a k'ayb'ub'al vuuj, malaj b'ak'uinh sb'at a lolonel satk'olal vuuj.
Wach'nhej in b'eyb'al t'a ichanh. Ix in ya'ilej in b'a yic max in b'at t'a chukal.
Yujnhejton chi' ix ak' spac t'ayin yujto tojol svutej in b'a, malaj pax in mul t'a ichanh ach Jehová.
Mamin, a eb' tzach k'anab'ajani, ol elk'och syal a lolonel t'a eb'. Ha eb' wach' spensar, wach' pax tzutej a pensar t'a eb'.
Wach' tzutej a b'ha t'a eb' wach' sb'eyb'al, palta tza ch'ox a jelanil a tenanek' spensar eb' ixtum anima.
Tza col eb' emnaquil, haxo eb' syik'chaanh sb'a, tziq'uemta eb'.
Mamin Jehová, a achton tzak' sakil k'inal t'ayin. Ha achton tzik'canel k’ik’ k’inal t'ayin ach in Diosal.
Yuj a colval ix in saclemejb'at eb' soldado, ix in k'axpajek' t'a yib'anh smuroal juntzanh chonhab'.
Ach Jehová in Diosal, yelxo val te wach' a b'eyb'al. Ha a lolonel ix ak'cani, smoj ton val malaj co chab'k'olal t'ay. Tza colel masanil mach yipk'olal aj yuj.
Mamin Jehová, malaj junocxo Dios, a achnhej. ¿Tocval ay junocxo colvajum icha ach tik?
Ach in Diosal, a ach tzak'nhej vip. Ha ach tzin a cuchb'ej t'a jun b'e te wach'.
Icha sb'ey junok nok' k'ultaquil chej, icha val chi' tz'aj in b'ey uuj. D'a sattac vitz yeq'ui, tek'tek' vaj uuj.
Ha ach tzin a k'ayb'ej t'a oval, tzak'anpax vip yic tzin pacchitan junok jul-lab' nab'a bronce.
Mamin, a ach tzin a tanhvej, tzin a colani. Ha a wach' k'ab' tzin yamanq'ue linhan. Yujnhej a wach'k'olal ix in ik'chaanh.
Wach' ix utej in b'e a b'oani yic wach' max in el-laj nhernajoc.
Ix in pech eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin, ix yamchaj eb' vuuj. Maj in ochlaj vaan masanto ix cham eb' vuuj.
Chok' ix vutejcan eb' yic wach' manhxo ol q'ue vaan eb'. Ix telvi eb' t'a skal voc.
Ha achton tzak' vip yic svak'an oval. Ha eb' schichon sk'ol t'ayin, tzak' yaq'uem sb'a eb' t'ayin.
Ha ach tza pechel eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin. Yuj chi' syal in satanel eb' malaj tzin och t'ay.
Sk'an colval eb', palta malaj mach scolan eb'. Stevi eb' t'ayach Jehová, palta max ach tak'vilaj t'a eb'.
Chok' tz'aj eb' vuuj icha val lum pococ tz'ik'chajq'ue vaan yuj ik'. Tzin tek'anem eb' icha val stek'chajem lum sok'om t'a yoltac b'e.
Tzin a colel t'a yoval eb' ch'oc chonhab'il, tzin ak'ancanoch yajaliloc juntzanh nivac chonhab'. Ha eb' anima manh vojtacoclaj, a eb' tzin ak'an servil.
Anhej syab'an vab'ixal eb', tzin sk'anab'ajan eb'. Ha eb' ch'oc chonhab'il chi', syak'och sb'a eb' t'a yol in k'ab'.
Tz'ib'xiq'ue eb' yuj xivelal ayic tz'elta eb' t'a yol scuartel.
Mamin Jehová, pitzan ach. Ach in Columal, alchajocab' wach' lolonel t'ayach. Ach Dios in Columal, ik'jocab' chaanh a b'i.
Ha ach tzak' yojtaquejel eb' tzin ixtani to ayach och ved'oc. Tzik'ancot eb' ch'oc chonhab'il t'a yalanh in mandar.
Ha ach tzin a colel t'a yoval sk'ol eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin, aton eb' schichon sk'ool t'ayin. Mamin, tzin a colanpax t'a eb' comonnhej smak'an anima.
Yuj chi' sval wach' lolonel t'ayach t'a skal juntzanh nivac chonhab', tzin b'itanpax a b'i.

Uuj val, svak' ganar nivac oval a in rey in tik, a in sik'b'il in el uuj. D'a masanil tiempo tza ch'ox a wach'k'olal t'ayin, a in David in tik yet' t'a eb' vinhtilal icha ajnac alani, xchi vinhaj David t'a sb'it t'a Jehová.
